details.Allegations:
THE CUSTOMER ALLEGES BREACH OF FIDUCIARY DUTIES UNDER THE EMPLOYEE RETIREMENT INCOME SECURITY ACT
OF 1974 AND BREACH OF CONTRACT IN CONNECTION WITH IMPRUDENT MANAGEMENT OF THE CUSTOMER'S
INVESTMENT PORTFOLIO BY THE FIRM AND CERTAIN NAMED INDIVIDUALS BETWEEN 2012 AND 2019.

alerts.description:
Customer dispute on 12/3/2019. Resolution: Settled. Allegations: THE CUSTOMER ALLEGES BREACH OF FIDUCIARY DUTIES UNDER THE EMPLOYEE RETIREMENT INCOME SECURITY ACT
OF 1974 AND BREACH OF CONTRACT IN CONNECTION WITH IMPRUDENT MANAGEMENT OF THE CUSTOMER'S
INVESTMENT PORTFOLIO BY THE FIRM AND CERTAIN NAMED INDIVIDUALS BETWEEN 2012 AND 2019.. Damage requested: $16,326,890.00. Settlement: $2,500,000.00
